original_text: The Lord says this: ‘Listen to me, you people of Israel. I will bring an army to attack you. They will come from a nation that is far away. It is a strong nation that started long ago. You do not know their language. You cannot understand what they say. The Lord says this:
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀이니라 이스라엘 집이여 보라 내가 한 나라를 먼 곳에서 너희에게로 오게 하리니 곧 강하고 오랜 민족이라 그 나라 말을 네가 알지 못하며 그 말을 네가 깨닫지 못하느니라

sentences.original_text: I will bring an army to attack you.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희를 치려고 한 민족을 멀리서 데려오리라.

sentences.original_text: They will come from a nation that is far away.
It is a strong nation that started long ago.
You do not know their language.
You cannot understand what they say.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그들이 말하는 것을 이해할 수 없다.
